jointPositions.description: Current joint positions of the robot

shoulder_pan_joint.description: Current shoulder pan joint position in degrees

shoulder_lift_joint.description: Current shoulder lift joint position in degrees

elbow_joint.description: Current elbow joint position in degrees

wrist_1_joint.description: Current wrist 1 joint position in degrees

wrist_2_joint.description: Current wrist 2 joint position in degrees

wrist_3_joint.description: Current wrist 3 joint position in degrees

moveToCartesian.description: Compute IK from position and orientation (degrees)

orientation.description: Either roll/pitch/yaw in degrees OR quaternion x/y/z/w

gripOpen.description: Open RG2 gripper to wide position

gripClose.description: Close RG2 gripper to narrow position

moveToJoint.description: Move robot to specified joint positions

shoulder_pan_joint.description: Shoulder pan joint position in degrees (range: -180° to 180°). Use null to keep current position.

shoulder_lift_joint.description: Shoulder lift joint position in degrees (range: -180° to 0°). Use null to keep current position.

elbow_joint.description: Elbow joint position in degrees (range: -140° to 140°). Use null to keep current position.

wrist_1_joint.description: Wrist 1 joint position in degrees (range: -180° to 180°). Use null to keep current position.

wrist_2_joint.description: Wrist 2 joint position in degrees (range: -180° to 180°). Use null to keep current position.

wrist_3_joint.description: Wrist 3 joint position in degrees (range: -180° to 180°). Use null to keep current position.

emergencyStop.description: Emergency stop - immediately stop all robot movement
